content:
Hello all,

I don't know if this is the proper channel, but I'd like to request a tag that users could add to issues that have been solved and are no longer necessary. This would allow someone with the power to close issues on github to go and close them. Would this be something that makes sense to implement?
My biggest concern is that the closure powers are probably only held by team members, whose time is better spent not going through a list of solved issues and closing them for triage reasons.
the contributors teams give sufficient permission to close issues
